markings: Verso: ULC stretcher, faded label: [Mrs. Alice Robertson, 11 Kirkland Rd. Cambridge, frame]; LC stretcher, typed label: [MARY CROSSWELL [sic.]. b. June 30, 1730: d. (date unknown): m. Hammond Gowen May 19, 1748 (sea captain d. June 14, 1762): m. Nathan Sargent 1763. Arthur R. Robertson, a lineal descendant of Mary Crosswell is present owner of portrait (Cambridge, Mass. October 1925.) Painted by Joseph Badger in 1763. Relined, cleaned, surfaced at Boston Art Museum May 1925 by H. E. Thompson.]
title: Portrait of Mary Croswell
